title: The Fastest Typists Alive: World Records That Will Blow Your Mind
description: Who is the fastest typist in the world? Discover the incredible records set by speed typists and the techniques they use.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
The Guinness Record

Barbara Blackburn held the record for years with a peak of 212 WPM using a Dvorak keyboard.

Modern Champions

Online competitive typists like 'sean wrona' and 'mythicalrocket' have hit speeds over 250 WPM in short bursts.

How Do They Do It?

Perfect muscle memory, high refresh rate monitors, and mechanical keyboards with light switches (like Cherry MX Reds or Speed Silvers).
